subject: Horse Racing
Harness Racing
Hambletonian (Harness Race)
lead_paragraph: Cross Traffic repelled the favored Fort Larned and then held off a late bid by Successful Dan to win the Whitney Handicap at Saratoga.
snippet: Cross Traffic repelled the favored Fort Larned and then held off a late bid by Successful Dan to win the Whitney Handicap at Saratoga.
